attributes.review: this app is poopoo and i would definitely NOT recommend. when i opened it i was immediately staring into the face of a cheeto puff. i did not know cheetos could be classified as ugly but here we are. the app flung poop in my face and i did not enjoy that experience. unless your eyes are looking to be assaulted do not download this horrible awful terrible excuse for an app. i will be filing a lawsuit and expect reimbursement for the money i am paying for therapy sessions.
attributes.title: ew gross

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app I started getting haunted by an orange figure. It would follow me everywhere and curse the ground I walked upon. Everything around me started to die. My friends, family, plants, animals, food, etc. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT TO BE CURSED. Yeah #bernie2020
attributes.title: Absolutely horrid app

attributes.review:
Iâ€™m a supporter of Trump, but that doesnâ€™t mean I support everything he does. Banning Tik Tok is not â€œpunishingâ€ China or going to hurt them. All itâ€™s going to do is hurt America and half of its Advertisement agencies. Most teens, young adults, and some older Americans use Tik Tok as escapism and for fun. Why take that away from us just because China were the lead programmers of the app? And whatâ€™s next? YouTube? Sony? Or whatever else website or app is made by some country or organization that might be against us? Thatâ€™s not going to do anything to the people that made the app, itâ€™s only going to hurt the people using it. The users and influencers. 
Plus, this Donald Trump app is glitchy as hell.
attributes.title: Save Tik Tok

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support my lord and savior, Cheeto Puff. 

When I opened the app, I immediately fell unconscious and woke up in a white room. I was laying on a cold, metal table, wearing nothing but a thin grey hospital gown. 

I was surrounded in the room by about eight or nine men in white robes. The only color in the room came from the red insignias on the chest. The robes even covered their heads, leading to a large pointed tip. 

As soon as I had processed what was going on around me, the lights changed, and the chanting started. 

At this point, I couldnâ€™t tell you what they were saying. All I could process were the black and white waves of light piercing my eyes. 

Then, Cheeto Puffâ€™s voice whispered in my ear, â€œvote for me, nobody can president better than I can. Corona is just a conspiracy. I faced corona better than anyone. My numbers are the best. Iâ€™m the bestâ€ 

I then woke up, with my head in a puddle of dirty road water on the side of Main Street, where I was when I opened the app. 

I was covered in gunk and felt disgusting. I also felt some sort of tingling pain in my butt. I wonder if they proved me. 

I will not be voting for Cheeto. And I do not recommend downloading the app. It will ruin your life.
attributes.title: Disappointed
